project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Implement the main game loop that handles user interactions and displays questions
Create a variable to store questions and answers
Implement functionality to keep track of the user's score throughout the game
Implement the display of the final score at the end of the game
Write tests to verify that all components of the game function correctly
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure everything works as expected
